about_the_game: Get your hands on the super-catchy soundtrack to OTUSUN LAND's farming simulator Hippoboar Rancher! Features 10 tracks composed by Yonao Keishi, including three demo versions! Comes with both MP3 and lossless hi-res WAV formats.
detailed_description: Get your hands on the super-catchy soundtrack to OTUSUN LAND's farming simulator Hippoboar Rancher! Features 10 tracks composed by Yonao Keishi, including three demo versions! Comes with both MP3 and lossless hi-res WAV formats.
